definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Subsistence only increases in an arithmetic ratio.
sentences.chinese: 生活資料只能按算術級數增長。

sentences.english: Prove that no four consecutive binomial coefficients can be in arithmetic progression .
sentences.chinese: 證明不存在四個連續的二項係數成算術級數。

sentences.english: Every large odd integer can be represeted as the sum of three primes which take from arithmetic progressions.
sentences.chinese: 解決了三素數定理推廣到素數取自算術級數的問題。
